thing-type.label: LZW31 Black Series Dimmer
thing-type.description: Black Series Dimmer<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtFor starters, we’ve upgraded our Z-Wave module for better distance. The switch can be used in any 3-Way or 4-Way setting and allows you to use either an auxiliary switch, a smart switch or your existing dumb switch (NOTE: this only applies if a neutral wire is installed. If there is no neutral wire, the switch only works in a single-pole setting).</p&gt <p&gtLastly, the LED bar can be changed to any default color you’d prefer and also allows for it to be dimmed, or disabled altogether.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtStart the Inclusion process on your HUB/Gateway. Turn the power back on and auto-inclusion will activate.You will have 60 seconds before it times out. If it does timeout,the backup method to pair/include the device is to press the Config Button (A) 3 times.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPut your HUB in Exclusion mode and press the Config Button (A) 3x until your HUB says the device is excluded.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Dimming Speed
parameter.description: How fast or slow the light turns on when you hold the switch<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtHow fast or slow the lights turns on when you hold the switch ( ie: dimming from 10-20%, 80-60%, etc)</p&gt <p&gt0 = instant on, 1=1 second, 100=100 seconds</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Dimming Speed ( Z-wave )
parameter.description: How fast or slow the light turns dim when you adjust via network<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtHow fast or slow the light turns dim when you adjust the switch remotely.</p&gt <p&gt(ie: dimming from 10-20%, 80-60%, etc)</p&gt <p&gt0= instant on, 1=1 second, 100=100 seconds, 101=keep in sync with Parameter 1</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Ramp Rate
parameter.description: How fast or slow the light turns on when you press the switch<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtHow fast or slow the light turns on when you press the switch 1x to bring from ON to OFF or OFF to ON</p&gt <p&gt0=instant on, 1=1 second, 100=100 seconds, 101=keep in sync with Parameter 1</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Ramp Rate ( Z-wave)
parameter.description: How fast or slow the light turns on / off via the network<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtHow fast or slow the light turns on when you turn the switch ON to OFF or OFF to ON remotely.</p&gt <p&gt0=instant on, 1=1 second, 100=100 seconds, 101=keep in sync with Parameter 1</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Minimum Dim Level
parameter.description: Minimum level the light switch will dim to<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtMinimum level the light switch will dim to (great for fixing flickering bulbs).</p&gt <p&gt1=1%, 45=45%</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: Maximum Dim Level
parameter.description: Maximum level the light switch will dim to<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtMaximum level the light switch will dim to.</p&gt <p&gt55%=55%, 100=100%</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Invert Switch
parameter.description: Inverts the switch<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtInverts the switch ( tap down = ON, tap up = OFF)</p&gt <p&gt0 = disabled, 1 = enabled</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_8_2
parameter.label: 8: Auto Off Timer
parameter.description: Automatically tuns the switch off after X seconds<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtAutomatically turns the switch off after x amount of seconds</p&gt <p&gt0 = disabled, 1 = 1 second, 32767 = 32767 seconds.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_9_1
parameter.label: 9: Default Level ( Local )
parameter.description: Default dim level when pressed locally<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtDefault dim level for the switch when pressed locally</p&gt <p&gt0 = Switch will return to the level it was prior to being off, 1=1%, 100=100%</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_10_1
parameter.label: 10: Default level ( Z-Wave )
parameter.description: Default dim level when switch on via network<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtDefault dim level for the switch when powered on via a Z-Wave command</p&gt <p&gt0 = Switch will return to level it was prior to being off, 1=1%, 100=100%</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_11_1
parameter.label: 11: Power On State
parameter.description: When power is restored switch reverts On/Off/Last<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtWhen power is restored, the switch reverts to either On, Off, or Last Level</p&gt <p&gt0=Off, 1-100= specific % On, 101= returns to level before power outage</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_12_1
parameter.label: 12: Association Behavior
parameter.description: When should the switch send commands to associated devices<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt01=local, 02=3-way, 03=3-way &amp; local, 04=Z-wave hub, 05=Z-wave Hub &amp; local</p&gt <p&gt06=Z-wave hub &amp; 3-way, 07=Z-wave hub &amp; local &amp; 3-way, 08=timer, 09= timer &amp;local</p&gt <p&gt10=timer &amp; 3-way, 11=timer &amp; 3-way &amp; local, 12= timer &amp; z-wave hub</p&gt <p&gt13= timer &amp; z-wave hub &amp; local, 14=timer &amp; z-wave hub &amp; 3-way, 15= ALL</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_13_1
parameter.label: 13: LED Indicator Colo
parameter.description: Sets the default color of the LED bar<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis will set the default color of the LED bar</p&gt <p&gtCalculated by using a hue color circle ( value / 255*360) see website for more detail</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_14_1
parameter.label: 14: LED Indicator Intensity
parameter.description: Sets the intensity of the LED bar (brightness)<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis will set the intensity of the LED bar</p&gt <p&gt0=Off, 1=low, 5=medium, 10=high</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_15_1
parameter.label: 15: LED Indicator Intensity (when off)
parameter.description: LED Indicator brightness when switch is off<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtLED Indicator intensity when light is off</p&gt <p&gt0=off , 1 =low, 10=high</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_16_4
parameter.label: 16: LED Strip Effect
parameter.description: Add sweet effects to the LED bar<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSweet effects: pulse, chase, solid, etc</p&gt <p&gtByte 1 = choose color</p&gt <p&gtByte 2 = Choose Brightness Level</p&gt <p&gtByte 3 = Choose Effect</p&gt <p&gtByte 4 = Duration </p&gt <p&gtSee Website for details</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_17_1
parameter.label: 17: LED timeout
parameter.description: Timeout for LED notifications<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtChanges the amount of time the RGB bar shows the dim level if the LED bar has been disabled</p&gt <p&gt0=always off, 1=1 second after level is adjusted, 10=10 seconds after level is adjusted</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: group_4
parameter.label: 4: Control multiple bulbs / dimmers with level change
